tui.settings.agents.desc.code_gpt_5_2: Highest-capacity GPT option for tricky reasoning; use when correctness matters most.
tui.settings.agents.desc.code_gpt_5_2_co: Primary coding agent for implementation and multi-file edits; strong speed and reliability.
tui.settings.agents.desc.code_gpt_5_1_co: Budget coding agent for small changes and quick refactors; use when speed and cost matter.
tui.settings.agents.desc.claude_opus_4_5: Higher-capacity Claude model for complex reasoning; use when you want the strongest Claude.
tui.settings.agents.desc.claude_sonnet_4: Balanced Claude model for implementation and debugging; a solid default when you want Claude.
tui.settings.agents.desc.claude_haiku_4_: Fast Claude model for simple tasks, drafts, and quick iterations; pick when latency matters.
tui.settings.agents.desc.gemini_3_pro: Higher-capacity Gemini model for harder tasks; use when gemini-3-flash misses details.
tui.settings.agents.desc.gemini_3_flash: Primary Gemini default for most tasks; fast and low-cost with near gemini-3-pro quality.
tui.settings.agents.desc.qwen_3_coder: Fast and capable alternative; useful as a second opinion or for cross-checking.
tui.accounts.option.auto_switch.desc: Switches to another connected account on 429/usage_limit.
tui.accounts.option.api_key_fallback: API key fallback when all accounts limited
tui.accounts.option.api_key_fallback.des: Only used if every connected ChatGPT account is limited.
tui.model_selection.title.auto_review_re: Select Auto Review Resolve Model & Reasoning
tui.model_selection.follow_chat.title: Follow Chat Mode
tui.model_selection.follow_chat.desc: Use the active chat model and reasoning; stays in sync as chat changes.
tui.model.desc.gpt_5_2: Latest frontier model with improvements across knowledge, reasoning, and coding.
tui.model.desc.gpt_5_1_codex_max: Latest Codex-optimized flagship for deep and fast reasoning.
tui.model.desc.gpt_5_1_codex_mini: Optimized for Code. Cheaper, faster, but less capable.
tui.model.desc.gpt_5_1: Broad world knowledge with strong general reasoning.
tui.reasoning_desc.balance_everyday: Balances speed and reasoning depth for everyday tasks
tui.reasoning_desc.maximize_complex: Maximizes reasoning depth for complex problems
tui.reasoning_desc.extra_high_complex: Extra high reasoning depth for complex problems
tui.reasoning_desc.extra_high_complex_sh: Extra high reasoning for complex problems
tui.reasoning_desc.balance_straightforwa: Balances speed with some reasoning; useful for straightforward queries and short explanations
tui.reasoning_desc.solid_general: Provides a solid balance of reasoning depth and latency for general-purpose tasks
tui.reasoning_desc.dynamic_adjust: Dynamically adjusts reasoning based on the task
tui.reasoning_desc.maximize_ambiguous: Maximizes reasoning depth for complex or ambiguous problems
tui.reasoning_desc.greater_complex: Greater reasoning depth for complex problems

tui.mode.hint: Choose a mode (affects automatic validations after changes).

tui.help.desc.dollar: Open shell terminal without a preset command

tui.agents.filter.label: Filter
tui.agents.sort.label: Sort:

tui.slash.desc.new: start a new chat during a conversation
tui.slash.desc.init: create an AGENTS.md file with instructions for Code
tui.slash.desc.compact: summarize conversation to prevent hitting the context limit
tui.slash.desc.undo: restore the workspace to the last Code snapshot
tui.slash.desc.review: review your changes for potential issues
tui.slash.desc.cloud: browse, apply, and create cloud tasks
tui.slash.desc.status: show current session configuration and token usage
tui.slash.desc.update: check for updates and optionally upgrade
tui.slash.desc.settings: manage all settings in one place
tui.slash.desc.demo: populate history with demo cells (dev/perf only)
tui.slash.desc.auto: work autonomously on long tasks with Auto Drive
tui.slash.desc.branch: work in an isolated /branch then /merge when done (great for parallel work)
tui.slash.desc.merge: merge current worktree branch back to default
tui.slash.desc.resume: resume a past session for this folder

tui.browser.config.segments_max.invalid: Invalid segments_max value. Use a number.

tui.browser.config.usage:
Usage: /browser config <key> <value>
Available keys: viewport, segments_max
tui.browser.unknown_command:
Unknown browser command: '${value}'
Usage: /browser <url> | off | status | fullpage | config
tui.browser.help:
Browser commands:
• /browser <url> - Open URL in internal browser
• /browser off - Disable browser mode
• /browser status - Show current status
• /browser fullpage [on|off] - Toggle full-page mode
• /browser config <key> <value> - Update configuration

Use /chrome [port] to connect to external Chrome browser
